Remove execute bits that accidentally got set on the file permissions.

Courtesy Сергей Богданов <bogdanov.sergey.vyacheslavovich@gmail.com>

Turn off execute bit for resource files.

This bit gets set when files come from MS-DOS file systems.

There's no reason to have it set.

Add Solarized Light / Solarized Dark text color themes.

See this web site for a description of the Solarized color scheme:

http://ethanschoonover.com/solarized

Note that this is not the full solarized palette, it's just the foreground
and background colors. Perhaps we can implement the rest of the palette in
a future update.

Fixed hardware control 'stickyness' when switching views

To reproduce bug:
1. Hold down ctrl on a physical keyboard.
2. Create a new window using the (+) icon.
3. Type exit to close the new window.
4. Attempt to type into the original, control key
is still flagged as being pressed.

Merge branch 'master' of git://github.com/wisedog/Android-Terminal-Emulator into wisedog-master

Convert character encoding from EUC-KR to UTF-8.

This was done using the command-line iconv tool:

iconv -f euc-kr -t utf-8 inputFile >outputFile

I believe EUC-KR is a popular character encoding used by Korean PCs.

UTF-8 is the character set used by Android for all languages. Therefore
we have to convert the EUC-KR characters into UTF-8 in order to work
properly on Android.

In the future we will have to be careful when editing these files. They
should be edited using a UTF-8 editor rather than a EUC-KR editor.

Refactor this change to use the standard onPause/onResume protocol.

An alternate idea would be to share the same KeyListener across all
open terminal windows. That might be better.

Update setup script to work with Android SDK 22.

There's a new 'build-tools' package that needs to be installed.
We now build with SDK version 22 and NDK version r8e.

Change 'Unspecified' to 'Automatic'

I think that's a more accurate description of what the setting does.
Bump version number to 1.0.53
